text: tatha yahoodiyon ne kaha ki allaah ke haath bandhe[1] hue hain, unheen ke haath bandhe hue hain aur ve apane is kathan ke kaaran dhikkaar diye gaye hain; balki usake donon haath khule hue hain, vah jaise chaahe, vyay (kharch) karata hai aur inamen se adhiktar ko, jo (quraan) aapake paalanahaar kee or se aapapar utaara gaya hai, ullanghan tatha kufr (avishvaas) mein adhik kar dega aur hamane unake beech pralay ke din tak ke lie shatruta tatha bair daal diya hai. jab kabhee ve yudhd kee agni sulagaate hain, to allaah use bujha[2] deta hai. ve dharatee mein upadrav ka prayaas karate hain aur allaah vidrohiyon se prem nahin karata
